Package kleingarten.complaint

Class ComplaintController

  • java.lang.Object
    • kleingarten.complaint.ComplaintController
  • @Controller
public class ComplaintController
extends Object
    A controller to handle web requests to manage Complaints.

@PostMapping("/save-complaint/{plot_id}")
String saveComplaint​(Optional<org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount> user,
